simulated_ratings.feeling: Grim and riveting, with moral weight and slow-burn tension I appreciate.

simulated_ratings.title: Fargo (1996)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Darkly funny and cold-blooded—its offbeat tone and sharp craft really work for me.
